text:
地球online副本开启的时候，你是否遗憾没有机会选择自己的角色吗，现在你想有个机会体验不同样的人生吗？
在这款游戏中，也许你出生就带着金饭碗，也许你出生就天赋异禀，也许你的开局从0开始，但是随机的系统会给了你随机的属性，同时也带来了随机的事件，这些事情会有怎样的发展，进入这款游戏速速体验吧。 从零开始，重启人生！
trans:
Do you regret that you didn't have the chance to choose your character when the Earth Online dungeon was launched? Now, do you want the opportunity to experience a life different from yours?
In this game, maybe you were born with a silver spoon, maybe you were born gifted, or maybe your journey starts from scratch. But the system will give you random attributes, which also bring random events. How will these things unfold? Jump into the game and experience it quickly. Start from zero and restart your life!
